headline: Why Is Larry Robbins Bullish on Corteva, Inc. (CTVA) Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Billionaire Larry Robbins’ Long-Term Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Corteva, Inc. (NYSE:CTVA) stands against Larry Robbins’ other long-term stock picks.
